overview:
Jon Bonanno is a believer that a better world starts today. He expresses his mantra through his entrepreneurial activities, relationships with family and friends and general low-impact lifestyle.

Since starting his first company, Interbill, in 1995, Jon has founded, run, invested in, directed, advised and been involved with over 9 start-ups in the IT, wireless, games and cleantech sectors. He has a passion for building teams with the right people, where all participants are able to express and expand their talents elegantly, inspire one another and have clear and positive purpose.
